BG3 Warlock Class Features

Hit Points at 1st Level: 8+ Constitution modifier Hit Points at Higher Levels: 5 + Constitution modifier

Armour: Light Armour Weapons: Simple Weapon Saving Throws: Wisdom, Charisma Skills: Choose any 2 Skills from - Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, Religion

Padded Armor, Simple Boots Dagger Health Potion x2, Scroll of Revivify

Cantrips: Choose 2 Cantrips Spell Slots: 1 Level 1 Slot
